title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: On Linux, running build 20011127, the close button moves down when the view (e.g., Navigator) is resized smaller. This behavior is not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000. The tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), also move below the label when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Run the software on Linux using build 20011127.
2. Open a view, e.g., Navigator.
3. Resize the view to make it smaller.
4. Notice that the close button, pulldown menu icon, and other tool items move below the label of the view.
